start-marker-timecode.description: Start marker timecode in the format hh:mm:ss;ff

end-marker-timecode.description: End marker timecode in the format hh:mm:ss;ff

start-timecode.description: Start marker timecode in the format hh:mm:ss.mms

end-timecode.description: End marker timecode in the format hh:mm:ss.mms

recording-date.description: Date of recording of the video sequence

description: Timecode object to describe a start of video sequence (e.g. CCTV evidence) and the end of the video sequence.
name: timecode
